ygData.subject: RE: Question...
ygData.msgSnippet: That would be me.  I can personally attest that it is often very difficult for me to get a bind because of the time zone I live in.  When I do get to play, its
ygData.messageBody:
That would be me. I can personally attest that it is often very difficult
for me to get a bind because of the time zone I live in. When I do get to
play, its usually after 9PM Hawaii time. Thats midnight on the west coast
and 3AM on the east coast. What I usually end up doing is picking a zone I
want to adventure in and staying there for a couple of weeks. I don't go to
a new zone unless its a weekend and I can spend more hours playing.

Galtin of E'ci

> If I lived in Hawaii like some on this list
> I would despair of ever getting bound in my what would be my prime playing
> hours. You better know someone real well who can bind and you would
> probably be restricted to playing with those people where those people
> wanted to play.
>
>
